name: Conqueration
description:
This game is an interactive Google Slides game, where you can make choices that lead to different endings. There are 19 choices to the story line in this game, it will take about 20-30 minutes to complete.

You must click on the actual text in game to prevent most bugs. Take your time when answering choices.

This game was made in 2017. I've given up on it so if you want to take the game apart and build expansions, or whole new games go right ahead. The only rule is, share those expansions with me I wanna see what you can make ;) .

If you want to learn how to make or edit my game or other Google Slides games like I did let me know and I can show you.
